title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Glacier Highlights Map
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Glacier Bay by Boat     Visit on a Cruise Ship     Glacier Highlights Map                  Glacier Highlights for Cruise Ship Passengers       Your cruise ship will provide excellent viewing of a variety of glaciers. Routes and timing are always dependent on the captain's plan for the day, ice and weather conditions, and available time. This map provides some information on the most visited glaciers.  Â   Tidewater Glacier Highlights    Visit the Ice Ages in the upper West Arm of Glacier Bay
